description:
Not sure if that's only a problem of our used euca2tools...

euca2ools-1.2

BUNDLER_NAME = "euca-tools"
BUNDLER_VERSION = "1.0"
VERSION = "2007-10-10"
RELEASE = "31337"

---snip---
chronos:~ # euca-get-ajax-console 
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/euca-get-ajax-console", line 38, in <module>
    from euca2ools import Euca2ool, InstanceValidationError, Util, ConnectionFailed
ImportError: cannot import name ConnectionFailed
---snap---
title: euca-get-ajax-console: cannot import name ConnectionFailed
